item.title: #ItsViral | A #Vadodara man claims he lost three cars, inclu
item.description: #ItsViral | A #Vadodara man claims he lost three cars, including an #Audi, due to waterlogging after heavy rainfall in his neighbourhood.

item.title: #Stree2 actor #SunilKumar and spiritual leader #Aniruddhacha
item.description: #Stree2 actor #SunilKumar and spiritual leader #Aniruddhacharya have been approached to participate in the #BiggBoss18

item.title: #Crickit | Former pacer Mohammad Asif didn't mince words whi
item.description: #Crickit | Former pacer Mohammad Asif didn't mince words while slamming the #Pakistan team (via CrickIt)
